comment.author: 22565451@N02
comment._content:
Great images like this keep me coming back to your offerings.
Thank you for spending the time to scan and share these great 
shots of Vought biplane aircraft. Someday maybe the original
scans will be updated to your new sizing standard and shared,

Thanks again,

bill

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/22565451@N02] You are welcome.  We are working on getting around to your request!
